          <title>
            <string language="sl">Južna Amerika - zemljevid</string>
            <string language="en">South America - map</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Südamerika - Karte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Amérique du sud - carte</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Vaja z uporabo zemljevida južne Amerike (mesta, države).</string>
            <string language="en">Exercise in using map of south America (cities and countries).</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

(Städte und Länder).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercez-vous en utilisant la carte de l'Amérique
du sud (des villes et des pays).</string>
          </description>

          </description>

(πόλεις και χώρες).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ejercicio al usar la correspondencia de 
Suramérica (ciudades y países).</string>
